title: Darkness
content: and being blinded doesn't impact ability checks, you can hide within a Darkness spell and pickpocket relatively easily. This technique also works with the Fog Cloud spell. In combat you can cast it on your ranged fighters and scoot them in and out of the edge to keep them safe from ranged targeting and give melee enemies that come near disadvantage. Unlike the tabletop, the Darkness spell only obscures vision within the spell. The spell does not block line of sight and creatures can see past it
